ygData.subject: Re: CE: Solders and Elves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you really sure you want to argue with me about Thieves doing less damage than Solders?  I could send you two scenarios: The first one is legendary

--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> soldiers rock, and always will in my opinion. i HAVE to doubt that 
> thieves can do more damage. especially at the higher levels. bombs 
> are good and all, but my experience was you have to get the enemy to 
> walk fairly close to them, and if they did that it was more than 
> likely they could stomp you. but to the question at hand.

Are you really sure you want to argue with me about Thieves doing less 
damage than Solders?  I could send you two scenarios: The first one is 
legendary "The Bonus" to buy the character.  The two one contains 
tents and potions to help you defeat it.  Use the first scenario to 
buy whichever one first and write down the stats.  Then take it 
through the 2nd scenario.  Start over with the 1st one and use it to 
buy the other character with the same stats and go through the 2nd 
scenario.  I promise you the solder will run out of magical energy 
before it destroys one tent.
 
> elves aren't perfect to me because of the similarities of their 
> attacks. not to mention they are slow as molasses.

I would like to point that characters who are "slow as molasses" have 
an easier time using teleporters than characters who are "faster than 
light", but that's a discussion for another time.
